episodes.title: David Koresh: Inside the Final Moments of a Cult Leader
episodes.description:
Today we revisit the 51-day Waco standoff between David Koresh's Branch Davidians and the FBI, revealing the dramatic clash of faith and power that led to a tragic conclusion. While witnessing Koresh's rise as a charismatic leader, exploring his controversial teachings, and examining the escalating tension from the ATF raid to the final fire. Through firsthand accounts, we explore the complex motivations and failures that continue to fuel debate.

Instagram - @realstoriesdocs


Any queries, please contact us at: owned-enquiries@littledotstudios.com

episodes.title: Our Father, The Manic Cult Leader
episodes.description:
MANIC chronicles the filmmaker's struggle to make sense of the legacy of mental illness wreaking havoc over her siblings’ lives.
Convinced that her father holds a key piece of the puzzle, she sets out to find the truth about him, and discovers a man known alternately as a cult leader, a scam artist, a prophet, and a father of fifteen.

A man whose charisma and visions brought people together under the promise of spiritual enlightenment but left behind a legacy of pain and betrayal. Born George Edwards, he was no ordinary man. With a larger-than-life personality and unshakable confidence, he rose to become the self-proclaimed prophet of a close-knit yet deeply fractured community.

His followers saw him as a savior, a guiding light who promised to unlock the mysteries of the universe. But behind the scenes, Sean’s manic episodes and unchecked power spiraled into chaos. Families were torn apart, relationships were strained, and what began as a hopeful movement turned into a cautionary tale of manipulation and disillusionment.

Instagram - @realstoriesdocs

Any queries, please contact us at: owned-enquiries@littledotstudios.com

episodes.title: Growing Up In A Doomsday Cult: David Berg & The Children of God
episodes.description:
In this eye-opening documentary, join us as we delve into the unsettling world of The Children Of God cult. Led by the charismatic David Berg, this group initially appeared as a beacon of hope during the hippie movement but hid a dark reality of manipulation and abuse.

Discover the shocking practices and deceptive tactics used by Berg to control his followers, exploiting their trust and twisting religious teachings for his own gain. Through gripping testimonies and insights, we unravel the psychological impact on individuals raised within the cult, shedding light on the importance of awareness and critical thinking in preventing manipulation.

Join us on this journey to uncover the truth behind The Children Of God, and gain valuable insights into recognizing and guarding against manipulation tactics in any setting. Whether you're a skeptic, seeker, or simply curious, this documentary offers a compelling narrative that will leave you informed and empowered.

episodes.title: How To Escape A Cult: Ex’s Members Of Warren Jeff’s Fundamentalist Mormon Church Tell Their Stories
episodes.description:
The chilling truth behind life in a secretive cult. In this gripping documentary, we unravel the mysteries of Warren Jeffs' tyrannical rule and the courageous journeys of those who dared to break free.

From forced marriages to unimaginable abuse, follow the heart-wrenching stories of individuals trapped within Jeffs' grasp. Their struggles and triumphs will keep you on the edge of your seat, shedding light on the harsh realities faced by cult members.

episodes.title: The FBI's Waco Siege: David Koresh’s 51-Day Last Stand (Cult Documentary) | @RealStories
episodes.description:
An in-depth look into the life of David Koresh, the enigmatic leader at the heart of the Waco Siege saga, peeling back the layers to uncover the untold stories and hidden motivations that drove his followers to the edge.

From the shocking truths behind Koresh's apocalyptic prophecies, to his manipulation of followers, and the tragic events that led to the infamous 1993 Waco siege.

episodes.title: Messiah Or Manipulator?: Escaping the Grip of Sun Myung Moon's Unification Church (Cult Documentary)
episodes.description:
Ever wondered what goes on behind closed doors in a cult? Join us as we uncover the truth behind Reverend Moon's charismatic persona and the devoted followers who see him as nothing short of a Messiah. Through firsthand accounts from former members, you'll get an inside look at how the Unification Church operates, from its intense indoctrination methods to its control over every aspect of its members' lives, including their marriages.

From Reverend Moon's early days claiming clairvoyance to his encounters with religious figures, we'll trace the origins of the Unification Church and its rise to prominence in South Korea in the 1950s.

But it's not all spiritual enlightenment – we'll also shine a light on the darker side of Reverend Moon's empire, from his controversial support for politicians like Richard Nixon to his brushes with the law over tax evasion

episodes.title: American Heretics: The Politics of the Gospel (Christian Nationalism Documentary) | Real Stories
episodes.description:
American Heretics: The Politics of the Gospel takes audiences into the buckle of Bible belt where a group of defiant ministers, congregations, and community leaders are challenging deeply rooted fundamentalist Christian doctrine in favor of a Gospel of Inclusion. Labeled as “heretics” for their beliefs and actions, they refuse to wield their faith as a sword sharpened by literal interpretations of the Bible. Especially those fundamentalist Christian interpretations that continue to justify nationalism and hack away at landmark civil rights protections for women, minorities, immigrants, and the LGBTQ communities.

episodes.title: Reggie Yates & South Africa's Millionaire Preacher | Real Stories Full-Length Documentary
episodes.description:
South Africa's Millionaire Preacher | Reggie Yates Extreme | Real Stories

Reggie Yates concludes his travels around South African communities by spending a week with Prophet Mboro - a charismatic yet controversial church leader who is adored by his thousands of followers, and renowned as much for his dancing as he is for the `miracles' he performs. Boasting a collection of expensive cars and wearing an array of jewelry, Mboro has emerged a millionaire from the boom in Pentecostal `mega-churches'. The former BBC Radio DJ asks if Mboro can possibly be a messenger from God and confronts some home truths when recalling the time he rejected the African Pentecostal faith. 

From Reggie Yates' Extreme South Africa: The Millionaire Preacher

episodes.title: The Church: Code of Silence (Corrupt Priest Documentary) | Real Stories
episodes.description:
Secret internal documents reveal how church officials have protected priests accused of pedophilia by moving them from country-to-country, sometimes as far away as to Africa. They call it 'the geographical solution'. Even Pope Francis is implicated. When he was bishop of Buenos Aires, he tried to influence the Argentinean justice system in order to protect a convicted priest. 

From Cameroon to Argentina, America to France and Italy, this investigation traces the transfers of pedophile priests.

episodes.title: For The Love Of God: The Man Who Thinks He's Jesus (Cult Documentary) | Real Stories
episodes.description:
For the Love of God is a unique and compelling documentary examining the world of a man who believes he has had a 2000 year existence as Jesus Christ. Featured on Sky News, ITV’s This Morning, and the BBC, former IT worker Alan John Miller has been heralded by the media as a fantasist, and even a dangerous cult leader. However, his teachings are global, reaching tens of thousands across the internet, and his followers worship him worldwide, funding his existence and tours. Many travel thousands of miles to hear him teach, where he is often accompanied by his partner Mary Magdalene.
